pullRequest.title: [IOTDB-778] Support double quotation in Path and optimize the Path String usage v2

commit.message: Merge branch 'optimize_path_v2' of https://github.com/apache/incubator-iotdb into optimize_path_v2

Merge pull request #1628 from Alima777/optimize_path_v2

[Optimize path v2] Add MetaUtils Test

nodes.bodyText: This should be String device,because all the following usage of PartialPath is toString().
recover this, leave this to another PR， The pair structure is not good also
If the PartialPath extends the Path, this is no need to change.

commit.message: partialPath is child class of path

Merge pull request #1639 from Alima777/optimize_path_v2

[optimize_path_v2] fix align by device bug
Merge branch 'optimize_path_v2' of https://github.com/apache/incubator-iotdb into optimize_path_v2

nodes.bodyText: No need to construct a Path
We support all nodes surrounded by double quotes now. Modify the comments and regular expressions. Then add some tests for it.

Many places kept the origin parameter name.  I will not sign every place.
Bascially, storageGroup or storageGroupName -> storageGroupPath is ok.
Path and PartialPath are not in the same package now. I'm not sure it's ok.

nodes.bodyText: Why changing the access restrictions here?

commit.message:
Merge pull request #1641 from Alima777/optimize_path_v2

[optimize_path_v2] optimize code style

nodes.bodyText:
I think we can use PartialPath directly here. There is no need to transfer it to String. If so, you need to change the type of memTableMap in AbstractMemTable to Map<PartialPath, Map<String, IWritableMemChunk>> memTableMap.
And by the way, i think you should rewrite the both hashCode and compareTo methods in PartialPath. We can compare each string in string arraynodes instead of calling the fullPath() method which will retain it in memory until the PartialPath is cleaned by GC.
Why here we need to copy it?
Same as above, I think we can use PartialPath directly.
Same as above, if we change the key's type of the map to PartialPath, we don't have to call the getFullPath() method.

commit.message: Merge branch 'optimize_path_v2' of https://github.com/apache/incubator-iotdb into optimize_path_v2
